timeline.content:
Hi, this is Arushi from Amber, the official accommodation partner for University College London . I‚Äôm here to assist you in securing your ideal student accommodation. Let me know a convenient time for a call so we can discuss your options and move forward with your booking.
Looking forward to hearing from you

timeline.content:
Hello, please let me know your preference so i can share student accommodation options near your university. 

For relevant suggestions for your accommodation search, please provide the following information-

1)Your move-in date- This will help us check the availability.
2) Your duration of stay- Some apartments allow booking only for the long term.
3) Your room preference- Ensuite, Studio, Private room and Shared bathroom, Shared room and bathroom.
4) Your budget- We want to suggest apartments only in your budget.
5) Name of the university- To provide you with the properties closest to your university.

timeline.content:
Hey, hope you‚Äôre doing well!
Just wanted to check in, have you booked your accommodation yet, or are you still exploring options?
If you‚Äôre still looking, feel free to let me know your preferences so I can share some great property options and help you find the perfect student accommodation.
